scripts.clean: cd backend && npm run clean; cd ../frontend && npm run clean
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test:dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run test:dev"
scripts.test-ui: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run test-ui"
scripts.preinstall: cd backend && npm ci && cd ../frontend && npm ci
scripts.lint: rimraf node_modules dist; cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
